summary: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.
cast: Chizuru Ikewaki|Yoshihiko Hakamada|Aki Maeda|Takayuki Yamada|Hitomi Satô|Kenta Satoi|Mari Hamada|Tetsu Watanabe|Yôsuke Saitô|Kumiko Okae|Tetsurô Tanba|Yô Ôizumi|Yoko Honna|Ken Yasuda|Anne Hathaway|Cary Elwes|Judy Greer|Andrew Bevis|Kristen Bell|Rene Auberjonois|Andy Richter|Peter Boyle|Elliott Gould|Kristine Sutherland|Tim Curry|Katia Coe|Greg Berg|Erin Chambers|Robert Clotworthy|Kat Cressida|Terri Douglas|Courtnee Draper|Jason Harris|Brian Herskowitz|Mona Marshall|Randall Montgomery|Bradley Pierce|Diz White|Jenny Andrews|Makoto Aoki|Katsumi Chô|Daisuke Egawa|Yayoi Kazuki|Yûji Kishi|Tae Komamura|Mitsuru Miyamoto|Toshihiro Nakamura|Toshitaka Shimizu|Tarusuke Shingaki|Yuri Shiratori|Takayuki Suzui|Bari Suzuki|Atsuko Tanaka|Keiko Tsukamoto|Hikari Yono
title: Haru en el reino de los gatos
